name: Milkshake Battle
description:
Milkshake battle is a 2 vs 2 local multiplayer game where one team must throw explosive milk-leaking cows at the other team in order to blow them to bits. One player collects the cows while the other launches them with a stomp-induced shockWAVE. But be careful because Pachamama doesn't like her cows being killed.

-----

Game made at Global Game Jam 2017 - Glooban Buenos Aires site, Argentina
https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/milkshake-battle
